free_text.Learning outcomes: To introduce immunology principles and to give knowledge of bioengineering applications in the immunology field and the impact of biomaterials on the immune system.
free_text.Content: Introduction to immunology principles: innate  and adaptive immune system, humoral response, cellulare response, autoimmunity, tollerance-allergy, transplantation, vaccines. Bioengineering applications in immunology. Interaction of biomaterials with the immune system.
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Basic knowledge of cellular and molecular biology

free_text.Contenu: Introduction to immunology principles: innate  and adaptive immune system, humoral response, cellulare response, autoimmunity, tollerance-allergy, transplantation, vaccines. Bioengineering applications in immunology. Interaction of biomaterials with the immune system.
free_text.Prérequis: Basic knowledge of cellular and molecular biology
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: To introduce immunology principles and to give knowledge of bioengineering applications in the immunology field and the impact of biomaterials on the immune system.
